name: Chickpea Flour Scramble Breakfast Recipe
description: Easy peppery Chickpea flour Scramble. Soy-free Breakfast Scramble. Make with lentil flour or lentil batter for variation. Vegan Gluten-free Soyfree Recipe. When doubling the recipe, use a tbsp or so less water.

video.name: Chickpea Flour Scramble - Vegan Richa
video.description:
Easy Vegan Chickpea flour Scramble. Soy-free Breakfast Scramble with seasonal vegetables. Make the scramble with lentil batter for variation. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe. 

RECIPE: http://www.veganricha.com/2016/04/chickpea-flour-scramble.html

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

#vegan #veganism #easyveganrecipes #veganrecipes #veganricha #cooking

recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup chickpea flour (or use 1/2 cup + 1 or 2 Tbsp more besan/gram flour)
1/8 tsp kala namak (Indian sulphur black salt for the eggy flavor)
2 tbsp each of asparagus (green bell pepper, zucchini or other veggies.)
2 tbsp chopped red bell pepper  (or tomato)
cilantro and black pepper for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Blend all the ingredients under chickpea flour batter and keep aside. You can also use lentil batter from my lentil frittata.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend all the ingredients under chickpea flour batter and keep aside. You can also use lentil batter from my lentil frittata.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1/2 tsp oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook until translucent. 3 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat 1/2 tsp oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook until translucent. 3 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Add veggies, chile and cook for another 2 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Add veggies, chile and cook for another 2 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the red bell pepper or tomato and mix in. At this point you can add in some spices or blends or some chopped greens if you like.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the red bell pepper or tomato and mix in. At this point you can add in some spices or blends or some chopped greens if you like.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the chickpea flour batter over the veggies. Cook for 2 minutes or so until the edges start to set. Drizzle 1/2 tsp oil on the edges. Scramble up the mixture and continue to cook. The mixture will get messy and doughy. Scrape the bottom and let it cook undisturbed for 2 mins or so before scrambling again. Continue to cook until the edges start to dry out. Total 4 to 5 minutes depending on your stove and pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the chickpea flour batter over the veggies. Cook for 2 minutes or so until the edges start to set. Drizzle 1/2 tsp oil on the edges. Scramble up the mixture and continue to cook. The mixture will get messy and doughy. Scrape the bottom and let it cook undisturbed for 2 mins or so before scrambling again. Continue to cook until the edges start to dry out. Total 4 to 5 minutes depending on your stove and pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the doughy mixture sit off heat for 1-2 minutes. Then break into smaller chunks. Sprinkle black pepper very generously. Sprinkle a bit of salt and garnish with cilantro (optional). Serve over multigrain toast or in tacos or burritos.
recipeInstructions.name: Let the doughy mixture sit off heat for 1-2 minutes. Then break into smaller chunks. Sprinkle black pepper very generously. Sprinkle a bit of salt and garnish with cilantro (optional). Serve over multigrain toast or in tacos or burritos.
